### Exercise 3

```{r common-names}
seattlepets %>%
  count(animal_name, sort = TRUE)
```
  
The three most common names are N/A, Lucy, and Charlie

### Exercise 4

```{r common-names-by-species}
seattlepets %>% 
  group_by(species) %>%
  count(animal_name, sort = TRUE)

seattlepets %>%
  count(species, sort = TRUE)

seattlepets %>% 
  group_by(species) %>%
  count(animal_name, sort = TRUE) %>% 
  slice_max(n, n = 5) %>% 
  arrange(species, n)
```
